Content:
Programming Defects!!!
First few times, it worked. Thereafter, upon each network scan, it would hang at 121 IPs on my home network, then crash my tablet (auto-rebooting it). Stay away from the network scan part. Without this feature though, the tool is useless. I had to power reset my device over 20 times to get it to stop hanging at "optimizing apps" on each start-up (out of the 20). Great that I work in IT.... otherwise, I would've been out of luck as far as usability on my tablet.
